titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the strategic importance of Israel to the United States.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

bill.summary: 2/11/1987--Introduced. Expresses the commitment of the United States to Israel as a strategic ally vital to U.S. interests in the Middle East.
